uchicago.src.sim.space
Interface Torus

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbsMulti2DTorus, Diffuse2D, Multi2DTorus, Multi3DTorus, Object2DHexagonalTorus, Object2DTorus, Object2DTorus, Object3DTorus, OrderedMulti2DTorus, OrderedMulti3DTorus
public interface Torus

Identity interface that indentifies all implementors as tori. Used by NetworkDisplays to wrap nodes around the 2D display of a torus.

Version:
$Revision$ $Date$
Author:
Nick Collier
